greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in asymptotic expansion of sequence A259869.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..132
Richard J. Martin, and Michael J. Kearney, Integral representation of certain combinatorial recurrences, Combinatorica: 35:3 (2015), 309-315.
mathematica: nmax = 20; b = CoefficientList[Assuming[Element[x, Reals], Series[x^2*E^(2 + 2/x)/ExpIntegralEi[1 + 1/x]^2, {x, 0, nmax}]], x]; Flatten[{1, Table[Sum[b[[k+1]]*StirlingS2[n-1, k-1], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, nmax}]}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 03 2015 *)
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 29 2015
